pr_title: Fix duplicate event listeners in TemplateRenderer

timeline.message:
Fix duplicate event listeners in TemplateRenderer

in case where the element is attached several times during the same roundtrip.

Fixes vaadin/vaadin-grid-flow#837
Fix memory leak by removing detach listener when called

timeline.bodyText: Let me know if there's any better way to "listen once".
timeline.author: pekam

replies.bodyText:
There is Registration.once(Command) : Registration for "run only once" and Registration.combine(Registration...) : Registration to combine which I suppose you could utilize if you want to ?
(I'm not sure if using those makes the code cleaner, you can take a look but not going to block for this)
replies.author: pleku

replies.bodyText:
Thanks for info. Those methods don't seem to be exactly what I was looking for, and indeed might not help making this any cleaner.
So I'm fine merging this as is.
replies.author: pekam
